sermons.title: Your Friends Matter to God
sermons.description: This message is going to convict most of us.  Wilkerson preaches on the importance of choosing our friends.  He isnâ€™t speaking of those you work with or have a business or casual contact with.  He is speaking of the person that you allow in the inner circle of your life.  This person is likely a type and shadow of your own Christian walk.
